title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. title: Sidi Dragon 2 Carbon SRS Mountain Bike Cleats, Size UK 12. - SAVE R2,300!
text:
Item: Mountain Bike shoes and cleats

Brand: Sidi Dragon 2

Condition: Good

Size: UK 12

Price Gain: you will pay around R3,000.00 for a new pair of these shoes

Additional Info:

Lorica
Lorica is a man-made material that is lighter than leather. It is both breathable and water-repellent, however, it does not retain foot odors. As well as being tough and resistant to scratches, Lorica conforms to the shape of the foot like leather without the shoe has to be ‘broken in’. Comfort is assured.

Soft Instep Closure System
The wide, anatomical, and padded strap has been reduced and coupled to a soft, thermoformed material, increasing comfort and performance. It distributes pressure evenly over the arch area, is adjustable from both sides, and can be centered perfectly. The system is serviceable and replaceable, it also eliminates the need for using the SiDi High Instep Extender.

Caliper Buckle
The center part of the buckle is for micro-metric adjustment – lift to tighten, push to loosen. In order to completely open the buckle, both sides have to be pushed in.

Tecno II System
The Tecno II buckle uses a monofilament nylon line and a fine-tooth ratchet for smooth adjustment and even pressure distribution. The system allows frontal micro-metric closure and adapts the upper to a customised fit. The buckle is serviceable and available as a replacement part.

High-Security Velcro
Locking polymer teeth are embedded in the Velcro strap to make the closure more secure.

Adjustable Heel Retention Device
New technology for the heel-cup system. The retention device reinforces the top of the heel cup and improves fit by closing the back of the shoe more securely around the ankle. A couple of screws control how tight the top of the heel is, these can be adjusted so that the heel stays tight on any steep climb and every sprint.

SiDi Heel
The reinforced SiDi Heel keeps the foot in position and avoids the shoe from being deformed by extreme performance or prolonged pressure.

MTB SRS Carbon Sole
The revolutionary MTB SRS Carbon Sole is the ultimate sole for the high-performance, high-mileage off-road cyclist. The heart of this sole is a pure carbon insert reaching from heel to toe. This carbon insert and the replaceable tread are bolted to a nylon frame. This nylon frame is both tough and thin, designed to keep the ball of the foot close to the pedal axle.

From this design a small amount of flex is given to the toe area, however, the main body of the shoe is ultra-stiff, able to transfer the power. Excellent comfort is assured as the design gives consideration to the blood circulation in the foot.

Optional extras are available for this sole: a toe-guard to provide added protection to the front of the foot and toe spikes for extra traction off-bike.

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

text:
Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.

Maximum rider weight, 150 Kg

Its patented folding design was developed under a grant from DARPA to allow airborne soldiers to drop out of airplanes and into combat.The Paratrooper offers 24 speeds, front suspension, mechanical disc brakes, and the RackStand for hauling gear. Tackle any terrain, carry your gear, and fold to stash in your trunk.’

The bad:

title: ETRIKE -
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

title: 2022 27” WOW EBIKE
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

Bike is fitted with: 

·

stopping every time

title: 2010 GT Sensor small frame  27.5"(converted)
text:
2 x9 Groupset. 
Tubeless
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: Yeti Mountain Bike
text:
Yeti’s stiffer, more planted but still agile and pedal-friendly 575 platform is an excellent aggro trail bike. 

Yeti’s agile but confidently authoritative bike has been a favourite all-rounder for ages. It ticks all the right boxes for ripping up any sort of trail. It’s confident enough to use the whole trail and work the most radical angles, but agile enough to avoid what it can’t cope with. It also adds infectious enthusiasm, making it a near-perfect build-your-own aggro trail bike template. 

Ride & handling: Light enough to climb and charge well 

Skinny, loose, zero-tolerance singletrack trails are enough to put any bike and rider on edge.

title: Top of the range aluminium hardtail
text:
Your dream aluminium hardtail. This bike retails for R35900 new and has over R7000 worth of upgrades fitted. It is ready to ride and enjoy. There are no changes between the 2021 & 2022 model year. This is the bike you get after you take it off the showroom floor and make it perfect.
Size Large. Standard specification:
Fox Float Rhythm 32 shock with 3 way lockout. Shimano XT Deore Groupset with 32 tooth chainring up front and 51-10 at the rear.
Shimano hydraulic disk brakes. 
Upgrades: Shimano XT chain (R720) Shimano M520 pedals (R690). Spank Spoon handlebars (R1490). Specialised Body Geometry Seat (R3200). Specialised Body Geometry grips (R530). KCNC twin seatpost clamp. Your seatpost returns to the correct position after you remove it. (R470). One standard Synchros bottle cage and one Synchros bottle cage with integrated tools. To buy this bike brand new (if you can find one) and add these upgrades will cost at least R43000

WOW eBIKES is about more than

to Z.

to components and group sets

cheap Chinese eBikes

brand names.

hydraulic disk brakes for better braking.

of 1:5 and 80Nm of ample
torque.

SAMSUNG cells Lithium Ion Battery Pack which does not build 

up memory, gives a longer
range and improves battery life expectancy.

engineered electric system drastically improving reliability 

and durability.

title: POC Kortal MTB helmet - M/L
text: Perfect condition. Worn once - too small for my head.Uranium Black/Light Citrine Orange MattPRODUCT DESCRIPTION_Complete protection for trail and enduro, the Kortal helmet provides lightweight, extended protection and a seamless fit with goggles. With extended protection zones and uninterrupted ventilation, you’ll find safety and comfort wherever you choose to ride, and however hard you push.Certified for use with e-bikes, the helmet passes the Dutch NTA8776 standard, which tests helmets at higher impact speeds than for standard bicycle use. Currently, this is the only standard for e-bike helmets.In a crash, the patented breakaway peak will snap away from the helmet, helping to protect against neck injury.The helmet peak raises high enough on the helmet for goggles to fit underneath while not in use, and no helmet vents are covered by the goggle strap.
